resources.string: You wake up in the middle of a zombie apocalypse. \n You go outside and come across a fork in the road
You kill a zombie. \n You hear the voices of humans in the distance.
You walk towards the voices and find a group of survivors living in an abandoned building.
You introduce yourself as a survivor. The group tells you that they have found a cure to the zombie virus and offer you a vaccine.

You accept the vaccine and join the group. You and the others develop an antidote and try to administer it to as many zombies as possible while also recruiting other survivors to the group. 5 years later the zombie apocalypse is finally over.
You refuse the vaccine and walk out. As you walk, you come across an empty house.
You continue walking and come across a zombie
You attempt to steal their supplies but they stop and restrain you. You get thrown to a group of hungry zombies and they eat you :(
You continue walking. Along the way you encounter a zombie but strangely enough, it does not try to attack you.
You attempt to talk to the zombie but it can only make distressed noises.
You attempt to give the zombie a granola bar that you had in your pocket. The zombie looks offended at your offer and bites your neck and turns you into a zombie.
You attempt to give the zombie your wallet. It happily accepts and motions for you to come with it.
You follow the zombie for many miles, passing by empty towns and roads until finally you get to a rundown building. Inside is a large group of zombies.

You walk inside and they sit you down. The explain to you over writing that they are a group of non violent zombies and would like to cohabit with humans peacefully. They would like your help spreading the word.

You accept their proposal. Over the next 3 years, you travel with their group to spread the word and eventually generate enough money and support to buy a small apartment complex for humans and zombies to live in together. Violent zombies still exist and disrupt your new everyday life but you learn to live with it. You get married to a zombie and have half zombie kids and live happily ever after.
You refuse their offer and go about your way. Just as you are walking out, you get attacked by a violent zombie. The peaceful zombies try to help you but its too late and you die :(
You\'re weirded out by this interaction and attempt to run away. The zombie gets offended and eats you :(
The zombie trips over itself and smashes its face into the ground, effectively killing it. Just when you think you\'re safe, another zombie shows up!
You trip over a rock and the zombie attacks and kills you :(
You start fist fighting with the zombie and ultimately win. Fighting a zombie isn\'t easy and you are exhausted. Do you...
You see someone running toward you in the distance.
You run to the side and look for a place to hide
You hide behind the bushes and eventually fall asleep. A group of zombies find you and eat you :(
You enter the house and find out that it is actually infested with zombies! You get bit by a zombie and turn into one :(
You live the rest of your life happily as a zombie :)
Your zombie friends shun and abandon you. \n You die alone from hunger as a lonely and misunderstood zombie :(
You run towards them and see that they are badly injured.
You tend to their wounds. They thank you by giving you their extra supplies.
You guys form a group and walk into the nearest city. Which way do you guys walk towards?

You both go your separate ways. Unfortunately for you, you break your leg and become an easy target for zombies. Probably should\'ve formed a group when you had the chance, huh? You limp away but the zombies catch up to you in no time and eat you :(
You run off in search of help. Along the way you run into a zombie. Which weapon do you use to fight?
You miss and get eaten by the zombie.
You successfully kill the zombie and continue on.
As you walk into the city you notice that there are no people around. Which way do you go?
You enter an empty building and discover some scientific papers about a dangerous chemical leak. The papers suggest that an antidote is in the building somewhere.
You walk through the building until you come across a lab. You come across an important looking vial.

You pick up the vial to inspect it but being the clumsy person you are, you drop the vial and it shatters and all the fluid inside spills everywhere. Unfortunately for you, that was humanity\'s only hope for survival. In about a year, the entire earth is overrun with zombies and not a single human is left alive.
In shock, you run out of the building. As soon as you go outside, a zombie attacks and eats you :(
You run back towards the injured person and see them being eaten by a zombie.
